sentences: Kõik olid loogu võtmas, lastest alates ja vanakestega lõpetades.
context: The word 'alates' in Estonian is a preposition or postposition that indicates the starting point of time or an action. It translates to 'since' or 'from' in English and requires the elative case in Estonian when used as a preposition (before the noun), or can be used after a noun in the elative case as a postposition.
